1.text: To survive in this place you're gonna need to learn to climb.

2.text: I've never been much of an athlete.

3.text: It's easy here, everyone can do it! I'm basically climbing the ether right now!

4.text: Just go next to a wall and try to move up or down. But be careful that you don't run out of time!

5.text: What's ether... oh god I have so many questions.

6.text: It's best to just play along, kid.
